trans-unit.source: Converts instances of the <xref:System.String> type to and from <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> instances.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer forekomster av den <xref:System.String>typen til og fra <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref> forekomster.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a class can be converted from a given type to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om en klasse kan konverteres fra en gitt type til en forekomst av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter> supports conversion to and from the <xref:System.String> type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter>støtter konvertering til og fra den <xref:System.String>type.</xref:System.String></xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter>

trans-unit.source: Describes the context information of a type.
trans-unit.target: Beskriver informasjon om sikkerhetskontekst av en type.

trans-unit.source: The type of the source that is being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: Typen for datakilden som evalueres til konvertering.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the converter can convert from the specified type to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis konverteringen kan konvertere fra den angitte typen til en forekomst av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> can be converted to a different type.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om en forekomst av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref> kan konverteres til en annen type.

trans-unit.source: Conversion is possible only if `context` is a <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> type, and `destinationType` is a <xref:System.String> type.
trans-unit.target: Konvertering er mulig bare hvis `context` er en <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>type, og `destinationType` er en <xref:System.String>type.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.Source%2A> property for `context` cannot be null or equal to <xref:System.String.Empty>, which identifies `context` as an anonymous <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg av <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.Source%2A>-egenskapen for `context` kan ikke være null eller lik <xref:System.String.Empty>, som identifiserer `context` som en anonym <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> </xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: Describes the context information of a type.
trans-unit.target: Beskriver informasjon om sikkerhetskontekst av en type.

trans-unit.source: The desired type that this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> is being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: Den ønskede typen som denne forekomsten av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref> evalueres til konvertering.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the converter can convert this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> to the specified type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis konverteringen kan konvertere denne forekomsten av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref> til den angitte typen; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
